data.actual_result: The AssistiveTouch button makes room for the keyboard, but blocks the "Send" button by doing so.
data.expected_result: The AssistiveTouch button slides up to make room for the keyboard and the "Send" button.
data.short_description: AssistiveTouch button blocking the "Send" button - youtu (.be) /BGU7sJXJR84
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable AssistiveTouch in your device's settings and put it in the bottom right corner. - Open Discord and start typing a chat message. The AssistiveTouch button slides up to make room for the keyboard, but this causes the "Send" button to be blocked. - Compare this behaviour to another app like Apple's Messages app where doing this does not block the "Send" button.
